Different Crime.Crime Name: Administrative Dispute over Band Council Elections
procedural_fairness: Referendum Band Custom approved by 83% of participating voters
Second Band Custom passed via show of hands without clear evidence of broad consensus
Irregularities in the Referendum Vote were minor and did not materially affect the outcome
decision_reasoning: Referendum Band Custom reflects broad consensus among band members
Second Band Custom lacks sufficient evidence of broad consensus
application_details: Judicial review application filed under the Federal Courts Act seeking declarations and writ of quo warranto
result_of_case: Court ruled in favor of the Applicants
Applicants are the rightful Chief and Councillors
Respondents' claim to office is invalid
